Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Kamba Mitangu
Reviews.Content: Sony camerais hd camera and compact easy to use  and  is giving high performance pictures and,the handling and mailing was perfect

ProductInfo.Features:
18.2 megapixels "Exmor R" CMOS sensor for superior low-light performance
20X optical zoom,3.0-inch LCD
Rechargeable Lithium-Ion Battery Pack
GPS and Compass record shot location & direction
Optical SteadyShot image stabilization with 3-way Active Mode,1-Year Limited Parts & 90-Day Labor Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX20V 18.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Camera with 20x Optical Zoom and 3.0-inch LCD (Black) (2012 Model)
